title: Bihar worst performer in Covid vaccination, Why is CM silent: RJD asks Nitish
description: New Delhi: RJD MP Manoj Jha on Thursday slammed Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar for the way in which the vaccination drive for prevention against Corona Virus is being carried out in the state. One wonders what is happening in Bihar. There’s no clarity. Bihar today stands at the bottom in terms of vaccination, why is Nitish Kumar silent, the professor-turned-MP asked. He also slammed the Centre for its handling of the vaccination process. Many states have come out and said that they don’t have enough shots, what’s happening, he said. Watch this interview of RJD’s Manoj Jha with Times Now’s Prashant Kumar.
